items.title: [Whiteslist] Register Snowbridge ERC-20 Assets on Kusama
[Asset Hub] Enable State Trie Migration (again)
items.content: Trying again with different Transact origin and from the `Fellows` instead of `Fellow3Dan` origin: https://kusama.subsquare.io/fellowship/referenda/95

items.title: [Asset Hub] Enable State Trie Migration
items.content:
Setting migration limits for the bot to 128 items and 4096 max size per key.  
We can then run the bot to migrate all keys.

![Screenshot 2025-03-20 at 20.17.51.png](https://subsquare.infura-ipfs.io/ipfs/QmXWKwkWJWFztVW9rygqq6ZfsQkHdNrSY9cHzK5u53vWuh)

items.title: [Runtime 1.4.2] Upgrade Asset Hub
items.content:
Whitelist for Kusama Asset Hub runtime upgrade 1.4.2: https://kusama.subsquare.io/referenda/505

```bash
opengov-cli build-upgrade --network kusama --only --asset-hub "v1.4.2"
opengov-cli submit-referendum \
    --proposal "./upgrade-kusama-1.4.2/kusama-1.4.2.call" \
    --network "kusama" --track "whitelistedcaller"
```

And then manually replace the `lookup` with an `inline`.

items.title: [Fellows] Referendum #19 - Register Bridge Hub Parachain
items.content:
This is a proposal to add a Bridge Hub (BH) parachain to Kusama. All technical details can be found in the [Bridge Hub Genesis release](https://github.com/paritytech/cumulus/releases/tag/parachains-bridge-hub-kusama-v9360). The runtime is taken from the v9360 parachains release.

The BH will be the gateway between Kusama and other networks, like Polkadot and Ethereum. For now, the BH only contains some basic logic, and none of the bridge-specific pallets. Those will get added in future runtime upgrades; the goal of this proposal is to get approval from Kusama stakeholders and a "shell" operational such that bridge teams can focus on releasing their bridge logic, not launching a parachain.

The BH will primarily act as a message routing system within the network and between others. For example, parachains can configure their XCMP routing to interpret `parents: 2` (indicating, "go to another consensus system") as something to send to the BH to handle. Likewise, the BH can handle incoming messages and route them to the correct parachain within Kusama.

Once operational, a Polkadot<>Kusama bridge will allow more interaction between the networks. For example, the Technical Fellowship can move onto the Polkadot Collectives parachain and serve both networks; or the Kusama network (as a unit body) could join the Polkadot Alliance.

items.title: [Fellows] Referendum #18 - Statemine Upgrade v9360
items.content:
The parachains [v9360 release](https://github.com/paritytech/cumulus/releases/tag/parachains-v9360) contains updates that correspond to the v9360 runtimes of the respective Relay Chain. For Statemint/mine, this contains updates to the Assets pallet that breaks transaction version; wallets should update accordingly. For the Collectives Parachain, this merges the Founder/Fellow roles into one “Fellow” role and removes veto power. See the release notes for more details.

## Statemine

[Authorize Upgrade](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fstatemine-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x010204567aee7142708e9d73988e9cdfda135703e7a325eea85b6b68726f9839c4b6)

[Send from Kusama](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x630001000100a10f0204060202286bee88010204567aee7142708e9d73988e9cdfda135703e7a325eea85b6b68726f9839c4b6)

[Submit the preimage for the Fellowship referendum](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x2000882c00d3afc7202cede7c4ea5a90b155d3a84b3189429c006aeafdc53cbf2851e48e74)

[Open a Fellowship referendum to whitelist the call](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x17002b0f0247e16e4490236bd0c210a19fcfd7eab96b538bef98db7c45627d7cc5422fd20722000000010a000000)

[Submit the preimage for the public referendum](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x2000d42c03630001000100a10f0204060202286bee88010204567aee7142708e9d73988e9cdfda135703e7a325eea85b6b68726f9839c4b6)

[Open a public referendum to dispatch the call](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x15002b0d027e582731039d71f6e3a86756e2781a10e70b7528038c72f183681dc257a1d28535000000010a000000)

items.title: [Fellows] Referendum #16 - Four Auctions for LP26/27
items.content:
Following the successful start of the current, ongoing auction, this referendum schedules two more auctions for LP26 and two for LP27 to make up for the missed auctions. In January, there will be a follow up proposal for the 2023 Kusama auction schedule.

[Proposal](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x1804081d02aa2d0a6d33f23f5627c82ecf2a6dd44a39cd42dd0f023d57c399aaadb92b9de9c495f30001c08901000200000000480001e1681d02210b9da97ae4505df19d71b1d84420eb0200b5422273b0f589d89d4f26444d7b44a9f60001c08901000200000000480001e16c)

OpenGov Calls:

- [Submit the preimage for the Fellowship referendum](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x2000882c008df48bd58b340cac0872313efc8523042f99157adcac098765f7b98eabbbafee)
- [Open a Fellowship referendum to whitelist the call](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x17002b0f02af031e65e9e57c51e003d1399ed7c8a5193bdea2f51324023b1f87bf494c087022000000010a000000)
- [Submit the preimage for the public referendum](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x2000bd012c031804081d02aa2d0a6d33f23f5627c82ecf2a6dd44a39cd42dd0f023d57c399aaadb92b9de9c495f30001c08901000200000000480001e1681d02210b9da97ae4505df19d71b1d84420eb0200b5422273b0f589d89d4f26444d7b44a9f60001c08901000200000000480001e16c)
- [Open a public referendum to dispatch the call](https://polkadot.js.org/apps/?rpc=wss%3A%2F%2Fkusama-rpc.polkadot.io#/extrinsics/decode/0x15002b0d0285928b2b75ffadbfbd4e321f46183cb33f5a3b68baaca0ebf62d4695a01d00706f000000010a000000)
